DataElement.preferredName: Porcelain Veneer Dental Professional Practice Acid Etching Use Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: indicator for the use of an acid to condition tooth structure, resulting in a superficial demineralization with a restoration consisting of a layer of tooth-colored porcelain material cemented to the surface of a tooth in a health care professional business directed towards treatment and care of patients pertaining to a tooth or teeth, or to odontology.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Porcelain Veneer Dental Professional Practice Acid Etching Use
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to the use of an acid to condition tooth structure, resulting in a superficial demineralization with a restoration consisting of a layer of tooth-colored porcelain material cemented to the surface of a tooth in a health care professional business directed towards treatment and care of patients pertaining to a tooth or teeth, or to odontology.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A restoration consisting of a layer of tooth-colored porcelain material cemented to the surface of a tooth.

Concepts.definition: A restoration consisting of a layer of tooth-colored porcelain material cemented to the surface of a tooth.

Property.preferredName: Dental Professional Practice Acid Etching Use
Property.preferredDefinition: Pertaining to a tooth or teeth, or to odontology.:Health care professional business directed towards treatment and care of patients.:Using an acid to condition tooth structure, resulting in a superficial demineralization.:Use; put into service; make work or employ (something) for a particular purpose or for its inherent or natural purpose.

Concepts.definition: Pertaining to a tooth or teeth, or to odontology.
Health care professional business directed towards treatment and care of patients.
The use of an acid to condition tooth structure, resulting in a superficial demineralization.
A manner, or usual, or accepted practice of using something.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: groups, institutions, or clinical facilities that conduct clinical research or tests, or analyze clinical data.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: an indicator for use of Porcelain Veneer (a layer of tooth-colored material consisting mainly of kaolin, feldspar and flux attached to the surface by direct fusion, cementation, or mechanical retention).
